s: At Clorts, we believe mountain explores in the wild outdoors, we would get strength and courage. The Amazon.com Clorts store allows you to shop online for outdoor footwear. Clorts’s wide selection of footwear includes everything from hiking boots and hiking shoes to casual sandals and casual ...

Clorts was established formally in 2006 as an all weather outdoor shoe company and is striving to create the suitable shoes for the outdoor enthusiasts. The brand name Clorts is the combination of "Climbing" and "Sports" which concentrates on the innovation and exploration of outdoor shoes.
